        public void startSSHConnection(String sshhostname,String sshusername,String sshpassword,String sshprivatekey) throws IOException { this.sshHostname=sshhostname; this.sshUsername=sshusername; this.sshPrivatekey=sshprivatekey; this.sshPassword=sshpassword; System.out.println("Entered in startSSHConnection method"); System.out.println("The SSH Host name:"+this.sshHostname); System.out.println("The SSH username name:"+this.sshUsername); System.out.println("The SSH password name:"+this.sshPassword); System.out.println("The SSH privatekey:"+this.sshPrivatekey); connection = new Connection(this.sshHostname ); connection.connect(); if(sshPrivatekey.isEmpty()!=true) { String content= readFile(sshPrivatekey, StandardCharsets.UTF_8); //connection.authenticateWithPublicKey(username,content.toCharArray(),""); connection.authenticateWithPublicKey(sshUsername,content.toCharArray(),sshPassword); } else { System.out.println("Using authentication with password method"); // Authenticate using password connection.authenticateWithPassword( this.sshUsername, this.sshPassword ); System.out.println("Authentication with password is done."); } // Open a session session = connection.openSession(); System.out.println("The session details:"+ session); // Execute the command //session.execCommand("date"); session.startShell(); Commenting this snippet as it is of no use for now // Execute the command //session.execCommand( command ); // Read the results StringBuilder sbOut = new StringBuilder(); StringBuilder sbErr = new StringBuilder(); InputStream stdOut = new StreamGobbler( session.getStdout() ); InputStream stdErr = new StreamGobbler( session.getStderr() ); BufferedReader brOut = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(stdOut)); BufferedReader brErr = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(stdErr)); String lineOut = brOut.readLine(); String lineErr = brErr.readLine(); while( lineOut != null ) { sbOut.append( lineOut + "\n" ); lineOut = brOut.readLine(); } while( lineErr != null ) { sbErr.append( lineErr + "\n" ); lineErr = brErr.readLine(); } // Close the session session.close(); // Logout from the server connection.close(); //Check exit code from shell if (session.getExitStatus() == 0) { //Set beanshell status IsSuccess = true; // Return stdout return sbOut.toString(); } else { //Set beanshell status IsSuccess = false; // Return stderr return sbErr.toString(); } } //Close SSH Connection public void closeSSHConnection() { // Close the session session.close(); // Logout from the server connection.close(); } //adding method for reading files static String readFile(String path, Charset encoding) throws IOException { byte[] encoded = Files.readAllBytes(Paths.get(path)); return new String(encoded, encoding); } -------
